output_list.reason: Integer overflow in mintToken function allows the owner to set the balance of an arbitrary user to any value.
Bad randomness in buy function allows attackers to always win and increase the contract's balance.
Bad randomness in sell function allows attackers to always win and increase the contract's balance.
Integer overflow in mine function allows the doftManager to set the balance of any user to any value.
Wrong logic in transferFrom function allows attackers to steal arbitrary tokens.
